Projects

GSA Housing Review Website

Full-stack housing review platform for CMU graduate students. Architected property listings feature and database schema to promote housing transparency across campus.

Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL, Supabase

View On Github →

Pygame Tower Defense

Complete 2D tower defense game featuring multiple tower types, upgrade paths, and wave-based enemy logic. Built an OOP framework managing Tower, Enemy, and Projectile classes.

Python, Pygame, Object-Oriented Design, JSON

View on GitHub →

Homeless Population Analysis

Statistical analysis and prediction model of homeless populations using logistic regression, business cycle modeling, and simulation-based forecasting.

MATLAB, Java, Statistical Modeling, Desmos

View on GitHub →

Personal Portfolio Website

This website! Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Focused on performance, accessibility, and responsive design without frameworks. Deployed on GitHub Pages.

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, GitHub Pages

View Source Code →

ASCII Generator

Build a flask web app that generates ASCII Animation through GIPHY API. The app allows users to input a search term, fetches a relevant GIF from GIPHY, and converts it into an ASCII art animation displayed on the webpage. Used render as a service to deploy the app online.

Python, Flask, GIPHY API, JavaScript, HTML/CSS

View On Github → View Page →
